Package oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.model

Class DomainSpec

java.lang.Object
oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.model.BaseConfiguration
oracle.kubernetes.weblogic.domain.model.DomainSpec
public class DomainSpec
extends BaseConfiguration
DomainSpec is a description of a domain.

    • setServerStartPolicy

      public void setServerStartPolicy​(java.lang.String serverStartPolicy)
      Description copied from class: BaseConfiguration
      Tells the operator whether the customer wants the server to be running. For non-clustered servers - the operator will start it if the policy isn't NEVER. For clustered servers - the operator will start it if the policy is ALWAYS or the policy is IF_NEEDED and the server needs to be started to get to the cluster's replica count..
      Specified by:
      setServerStartPolicy in class BaseConfiguration
      Parameters:
      serverStartPolicy - start policy
